name: Island Defender Jets
description:
Island Defender Jets is inspired by A-10 Cuba in graphical and play style, but instead of single missions, there is a persistent map. If you don't manage to sink a convoy in time, another might come and sink your carriers.

This game is intended to be a very light, playable, but short game. Also, it has very low system requirements and is suitable for playing on a medium-spec laptop with a touchpad.
